original_text: You have so much of everything! You trust God very well. You speak well. You know everything. You want to do many good things. You love us even more than we love you! So also do the best that you can as you give money to help others.
korean_text: 오직 너희는 믿음과 말과 지식과 모든 간절함과 우리를 사랑하는 이 모든 일에 풍성한 것 같이 이 은혜에도 풍성하게 할지니라

sentences.original_text: You have so much of everything!
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 모든 것을 아주 많이 가지고 있습니다!

sentences.original_text: You want to do many good things.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 많은 좋은 일을 하고 싶어 합니다.

sentences.original_text: You love us even more than we love you!
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 우리가 당신을 사랑하는 것보다 더 우리를 사랑합니다!

sentences.original_text: So also do the best that you can
as you give money to help others.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들을 돕기 위해 돈을 줄 때도요.
